content: row always purl ssk - slip one stitch slip another stitch knit these 2 stitches together st / sts - stitch stitches ws - wrong side of work yo - yarn over part with increases row 2 rs slip_stitch k1 mlr k1 m1l k1 slip_stitch 2 sts increased total 7 sts after co and one set up row you will increase row 3 ws and all odd row slip_stitch purl all sts two stitches 1 from each side of a central st row 4 slip_stitch k2 mlr k1 m1l k2 slip_stitch 9 sts total until reaching 26 sts total row 6 slip_stitch k3 mlr k1 m1l k3 slip_stitch 11 sts row 8 slip_stitch k4 mlr k1 m1l k4 slip_stitch 13 sts co 5 stitches row 10 slip_stitch k5 mlr k1 m1l k5 slip_stitch 15 sts row 1 ws purl all sts ©yevgeniya li 2025 - personal use only 2 row 12 slip_stitch k6 mlr k1 m1l k6 slip_stitch 17 sts row 9 slip_stitch k5 ssk k1 k2tog k5 slip_stitch 15 sts row 14 slip_stitch k7 mlr k1 m1l k7 slip_stitch 19 sts row 11 slip_stitch k4 ssk k1 k2tog k4 slip_stitch 13 sts row 16 slip_stitch k8 mlr k1 m1l k8 slip_stitch 21 sts row 13 slip_stitch k3 ssk k1 k2tog k3 slip_stitch 11 sts row 18 slip_stitch k9 mlr k1 m1l k9 slip_stitch 23 sts row 15 slip_stitch k2 ssk k1 k2tog k2 slip_stitch 9 sts row 20 slip_stitch k10 mlr k1 m1l k10 slip_stitch 25 sts row 17 row 22 slip_stitch k11 k1 m1l k11 slip_stitch 1 sts option 1 if you want a buttonhole slip_stitch k1 increased 26 sts total ssk yo k3tog k1 slip_stitch 7 sts option 2 with no buttonhole slip_stitch k1 ssk k1 increases are done you will now start the k2tog k1 slip_stitch 7 sts braid cable pattern the pattern itself is worked on 24 sts and 12 row you can use the note after row 18 there are no more selvage chart on p 4 or written instructions below sts note don t forget to slip/purl selvage stitches row 19 k1 ssk k1 k2tog k1 5 sts at the beginning/end of each row row 20 bobble all 5 sts tip for a better edge don t knit the first stitch instead slip it and use braid cable pattern it to start bobble row 1 rs k3 3/3 lc k6 3/3 lc k3 finishing row 2 ws and all even row purl all stitches row 3 3/3 lc four times weave in ends wash and dry as instructed on row 5 same as row 1 the yarn label row 7 k9 3/3 rc k9 choose your option for joining your row 9 k6 3/3 rc twice k6 headband row 11 same as row 7 1 button option sew on button if you made a buttonhole tip you may consider repeat braid cable until reaching desired sewing on two buttons spaced out for length for the correct length hold down the adjustable sizing co
